pos_mean_info_list.mean: [自] 调节器；调停者；（保险等）理算员

word_group.brief_definition: 调整期；调整阶段；调整周期
情绪调整；情感调节；情绪调节
调整问题；调节问题；适应问题

bilingual.target: 自行车的制动器需要调整。
她的显微镜镜片需要调整。

bilingual.source: The margin of this article needs adjustment.
bilingual.target: 这篇文章的页边需要调整。

bilingual.source: She made a slight adjustment to the mirror.
bilingual.target: 她对镜子做了一个小的调整。

bilingual.source: He needs an adjustment to his new schedule.
bilingual.target: 他需要对新的时间表进行调整。

bilingual.source: After the adjustment, the machine runs as before.
bilingual.target: 经过调整，机器运行如初。

bilingual.source: She made a fractional adjustment to the painting.
bilingual.target: 她对画作做了微小的调整。

bilingual.source: The adjustment of the seat took only a few seconds.
bilingual.target: 座椅的调整只花了几秒钟。

bilingual.source: After the adjustment, the image became clearer.
bilingual.target: 经过调整后，图像变得更清晰了。

bilingual.source: The arrangement of the conference table needs adjustment.
bilingual.target: 会议桌的排布需要调整。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a change of plan, a last-minute adjustment. Who from? I don't know, just another voice on the phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时计划有变，临时调整。谁要求调整的？我不知道，只是电话里的一个声音。

yingyinNormal.en: I think there will be an adjustment period after it takes over, but eventually... Wait, I'm sorry to interrupt. What do you mean by "takes over"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 待人工智能接管后，人类将会有个调整期，但最终...慢着，抱歉插句话，你说「接管」是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: Has it been a rough adjustment? It was a rough adjustment for us in high school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 适应的过程是不是特别艰难？反正对我们来说适应高中生活很艰难。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 提出折衷方法；做出调整

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 重新调整；重新调节；重新适应
n. 调整；调节；调节器；调解；适应

word_family.mean: v. 调整；整理；理算；评估；调节；适应；习惯

sense_info_list.en: a small alteration or movement made to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: As the home front lags well behind the workplace in making <highlight>adjustments</highlight> for working women, it's not surprising that women are more stressed at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于在为职业女性做调整方面，家庭方面远远落后于工作场所，因此女性在家的压力更大也就不足为奇了。

sense_info_list.en: the process of adapting to something such as environmental conditions

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调整；调节；调节器；调解；适应

word_family.mean: v. 调整；整理；理算；评估；调节；适应；习惯

sense_info_list.en: a small alteration or movement made to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: In February they made <highlight>adjustments</highlight> to the format, dropping some catwalk items immediately and promising that others would launch in the coming months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年2月，他们对款式进行了调整，立即放弃了一些t台服装，并承诺其他服装将在未来几个月推出。

examination_example.sentence: "While these numbers are still being validated by the state, we feel any <highlight>adjustments</highlight> they might suggest will be immaterial," Morgan wrote to the presidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Morgan在致总统的信中说: “尽管这些数字仍在得到州政府的核实，但我们认为它们可能暗示的任何调整都是无关紧要的。”

sense_info_list.en: the process of adapting to something such as environmental conditions

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调整；调节；调节器；调解；适应

word_family.mean: v. 调整；整理；理算；评估；调节；适应；习惯

sense_info_list.en: a small alteration or movement made to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: After some <highlight>adjustment</highlight> and sufficient time, Jill was able to answer the student's questions correctly 97% of the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过一番调整和充分的准备时间，吉尔在97%的时间内都能正确回答学生的问题。

examination_example.sentence: The nutritional and health crises that followed the policy of structural <highlight>adjustment</highlight>, he says, led to many children and teenagers failing to reach their full potential in terms of height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，结构调整政策之后的营养和健康危机，导致许多儿童和青少年在身高方面未能充分发挥潜力。

sense_info_list.en: the process of adapting to something such as environmental conditions

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调整；调节；调节器；调解；适应

word_family.mean: v. 调整；整理；理算；评估；调节；适应；习惯

sense_info_list.en: the process of adapting to something such as environmental conditions

examination_example.sentence: It clearly showed that while likability can lead to healthy <highlight>adjustment</highlight>, high status has just the opposite effect on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这清楚地表明，讨人喜欢可以带给我们良好的适应能力，而高地位对我们的影响恰恰相反。
